i1.name: Monkey's_Agility
description: {{sbc|Innate - Four Stances:}} '''Udyr''' has no [[Champion ability|ultimate ability]] and instead has 4 [[Champion ability|basic abilities]]. Each ability grants a ''Stance'': a unique passive effect that lasts until casting a different ability. Switching ''Stances'' will prevent his previous ''Stance'' from triggering any more on-hit effects, and incur a {{sti|cd|{{fd|1.5}}-second}} global cooldown on his other abilities.
Starting at [[Experience (champion)|level]] 16, all abilities can gain a 6th rank.

{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Udyr's''' [[champion ability|ability]] casts generate a [[stack]] of ''Monkey's Agility'' for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts and stacking up to 3 times.

{{sbc|Monkey's Agility:}} For each stack, '''Udyr''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|5 '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and {{sti|{{as|10% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, up to {{as|15 '''bonus''' movement speed}} and {{as|30% '''bonus''' attack speed}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Four Stances: Udyr has no Champion ability and instead has 4 Champion ability. Each ability grants a Stance: a unique passive effect that lasts until casting a different ability. Switching Stances will prevent his previous Stance from triggering any more on-hit effects, and incur a 1.5-second global cooldown on his other abilities.
Starting at Experience (champion) 16, all abilities can gain a 6th rank.
Innate: Udyr's champion ability casts generate a stack of Monkey's Agility for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts and stacking up to 3 times.

Monkey's Agility: For each stack, Udyr gains 5 bonus movement speed and 10% bonus attack speed, up to 15 bonus movement speed and 30% bonus attack speed.
i1.notes:
* {{bi|Cloud Dragon Soul|possessive=true}} bonus movement speed is special cased to activate on all of '''Udyr's''' spell casts due to not having a traditional ultimate.
* The global cooldown will not incur on abilities that are currently on a greater cooldown.
* '''Udyr''' does not receive extra skill points for his extra ability ranks, meaning he will not be able to reach maximum rank on all of his abilities unless he can level beyond the normal limit (e.g. {{tip|Ultra Rapid Fire}}).

q1.name: Tiger_Stance
description: {{sbc|Stance:}} '''Udyr's''' [[basic attack]]s [[attack effects|on-hit]] generate a stack of ''Tiger''. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack consumes them all to inflict ''Tiger Strike'', and also generates a ''Tiger'' stack.
{{sbc|Tiger Strike:}} The target is dealt {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds over 2 seconds. Leftover damage is dealt instantly upon subsequent infliction.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Udyr''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 ''Tiger'' stacks.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Stance: Udyr's basic attacks attack effects generate a stack of Tiger. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack consumes them all to inflict Tiger Strike, and also generates a Tiger stack.
Tiger Strike: The target is dealt bonus physical damage every 0.5 seconds over 2 seconds. Leftover damage is dealt instantly upon subsequent infliction.
Active: Udyr gains bonus attack speed for 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 Tiger stacks.
leveling: {{st|Total Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|30 to 180 6}} {{as|(+ {{ap|110 to 185 6}}% AD)}}|Bonus Physical Damage per Tick|{{ap|30/4 to 180/4 6}} {{as|(+ {{ap|110/4 to 185/4 6}}% AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* The name of the buff granted by entering ''Tiger Stance'' is ''Tiger Speed''.
* The triggering attack will generate the first stack toward the next, meaning the effect will always trigger on every 3rd attack. {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} will reduce this number to every 2nd attack, with '''Udyr's''' attack animations coded to "look ahead" and trigger the empowered-attack animation if he attacks a target while at 1 stack while ''Guinsoo's Rage'' is active. 
* ''Tiger Stance's'' primed {{tip|damage over time}} does not persist through stance changes.
* Unlike most on-hit physical damage, the bonus damage from ''Tiger Stance'' will not apply {{sti|life steal|link=true}}.
* The on-hit application of the DoT cannot be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}} nor {{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen|blocked}}, but it can {{tip|blind|miss}}.
* The empowered attack will not trigger against [[structures]].

effects.str:
• Total Bonus Physical Damage: (+ % AD)
  • Bonus Physical Damage per Tick: (+ % AD)

w1.name: Turtle_Stance
description: {{sbc|Stance:}} '''Udyr's''' basic attacks [[attack effects|on-hit]] generate a stack of ''Turtle''. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack consumes them all to {{tip|heal}} himself for {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|type='''missing''' health|key=%|2 to 4 for 11|key1=%|0 to 100|formula=2.5% increased by 1% per 1% of '''missing''' health}} of his '''maximum''' health|health}}}}, and also generates a ''Turtle'' stack.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Udyr''' {{tip|shields}} himself for up to 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 ''Turtle'' stacks.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Stance: Udyr's basic attacks attack effects generate a stack of Turtle. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack consumes them all to heal himself for 0 to 100 â€’ undefined of his maximum health, and also generates a Turtle stack.
Active: Udyr shields himself for up to 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 Turtle stacks.
w1.notes:
* The name of the buff granted by entering ''Turtle Stance'' is ''Spiritual Shell''.
* The triggering attack will generate the first stack toward the next, meaning the effect will always trigger on every 3rd attack. {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} will reduce this number to every 2nd attack, with '''Udyr's''' attack animations coded to "look ahead" and trigger the empowered-attack animation if he attacks a target while at 1 stack while ''Guinsoo's Rage'' is active.
* The empowered attack will not trigger against [[structures]].

e1.name: Bear_Stance
description: {{sbc|Stance:}} '''Udyr's''' basic attacks have an {{tip|uncancellable windup}} and {{tip|stun}} the target for 1 second. The target is then marked ''Mauled'' for 5 seconds, becoming immune to the stun.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Udyr''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and {{tip|ghosting}} for the next few seconds. During this time, his basic attacks against enemy {{tip|champions}} become empowered to {{tip|lunge}} {{tt|50|Estimated}} units toward them, unless they are marked ''Mauled''.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Stance: Udyr's basic attacks have an uncancellable windup and stun the target for 1 second. The target is then marked Mauled for 5 seconds, becoming immune to the stun.
Active: Udyr gains bonus movement speed and ghosting for the next few seconds. During this time, his basic attacks against enemy champions become empowered to lunge 50 units toward them, unless they are marked Mauled.
e1.notes:
* The name of the buff granted by entering ''Bear Stance'' is ''Primal Charge''.
* The name of the immunity debuff granted from ''Bear Stance'' is ''Mauled''.
* ''Bear Stance's'' self-displacement does '''not''' count as a {{tip|dash}} for the purposes of {{ri|Sudden Impact}}. 
* The triggering attack will apply other {{tip|on-hit}} effects and can [[critical strike|critically strike]] as normal.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} and {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immunity}} will consume the attack, meaning the on-target stun immunity is also incurred in the process.
* The empowered attack will not trigger against [[structures]].

effects.str:
• Bonus Movement Speed: %
  • Buff Duration:

r1.name: Phoenix_Stance
description: {{sbc|Stance:}} '''Udyr's''' basic attacks [[attack effects|on-hit]] generate a stack of ''Phoenix''. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack unleashes fire in a cone in front of him that deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit, and also generates a ''Phoenix'' stack.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Udyr''' creates an [[aura]] of pulsing fire for 4 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} each second to nearby enemies. He also instantly generates 3 ''Phoenix'' stacks.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Stance: Udyr's basic attacks attack effects generate a stack of Phoenix. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack unleashes fire in a cone in front of him that deals magic damage to enemies hit, and also generates a Phoenix stack.
Active: Udyr creates an aura of pulsing fire for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage each second to nearby enemies. He also instantly generates 3 Phoenix stacks.
leveling: {{st|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|40 to 240 6}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|40/4 to 240/4 6}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* The name of the buff granted by entering ''Phoenix Stance'' is ''Phoenix Flame''.
* The triggering attack will generate the first stack toward the next, meaning the effect will always trigger on every 3rd attack. {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} will reduce this number to every 2nd attack, with '''Udyr's''' attack animations coded to "look ahead" and trigger the empowered-attack animation if he attacks a target while at 1 stack while ''Guinsoo's Rage'' is active.
* The empowered attack will trigger and be consumed but will not deal its damage against [[structures]].

effects.str:
• Total Magic Damage: (+ 100% AP)
  • Magic Damage Per Tick: (+ 25% AP)
